body_html: Which is the status of .Net binding as of today? Are C# and F# really usable languages to work with Tensor Flow or the situation is still as described in this previous comment? Thanks for the quick recap

body: Which is the status of .Net binding as of today? Are C# and F# really usable languages to work with Tensor Flow or the situation is still as described in [this previous comment](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/18#issuecomment-270672765)? Thanks for the quick recap
